name: Forgery For Fools
description:
A security guard taking the night shift has found himself deep in the undercover world of art forgeries. Will you be able to master the skills necessary to replicate these priceless pieces of art.

How To Play

Select a gallery on the map. Once you enter, you will have a limited amount of time to copy as many paintings as possible.

Creating better forgeries will result in less gain to your criminal reputation.

Once your reputation bar is full, your criminal career is over.

Extra Bonuses For Creating A Perfect Copy

Controls

Right Click backpack to pickup a random brush

Right Click a paint pot to apply that colour

Hold Left Click on the canvas to apply the paint
